channel.title: Lottery on Delta

item.title: Lottery on Delta
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I redid the whole thing, just the partyhats, though.

if(command.startsWith("lotto") && playerHasItem(1505, 1)) { int message = misc.random(10); int[] reward1 = { 1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048 }; //This is your partyhat set reward switch (message) { //Saying this just basically means that you don't have to put if(message == 0) case 0://Instead it's replaced by this for(int itemToAdd = 0; itemToAdd < reward1.length; itemToAdd++) { addItem(reward1[itemToAdd], 1); } //All this is is just a better way of adding more than one item, plus it's easier to manage. deleteItem(1505, getItemSlot(1505, 1); sendQuest("@mag@LOTTERY REWARDS", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@blu@CONGRATS! YOU HAVE WON A PARTYHAT SET FROM THE LOTTERY", 8146); sendQuest("@blu@THE LOTTERY WAS MADE BY OWNER GOLEMX. CODED GREATLY!", 8147); sendQuest("@blu@ENJOY THE PRIZES AND THE SERVER.", 8148); sendQuest("@blu@SELL THE PRIZES TO SHOPS, PLAYERS, OR STAFF.", 8149); sendQuest("@mag@IF YOU HAVE SUGGESTIONS FOR LOTTERY TELL THEM TO :", 8153); sendQuest("@mag@OWNER GOLEMX BY DOING ::SUGGEST!", 8154); sendQuest("@cya@------GOLEMXSCAPE LOTTERY------", 8158); sendQuestSomething(8174); showInterface(8134); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+ " @mag@HAS WON A PARTYHAT SET FROM THE LOTTERY!"); break; //This closes "case 0:" }//This closes the switch statement }//This closes the command

Read full topic

item.title: Lottery on Delta

All the messages go at the same time on a loop and then it stops on the exact last one and i get always a burnt fish

item.title: Lottery on Delta
item.dc:creator: @blank2006 blank2006
item.description:
@blank2006 wrote:



[code=]if (command.startsWith("lotto")
&& playerHasItemAmount(1505,1)) {
int message = misc.random(10);//lotto prizes by owner golemx
if(message == 0)
addItem(1040, 1);
addItem(1038, 1);
addItem(1042, 1);
addItem(1044, 1);
addItem(1046, 1);
addItem(1048, 1);
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest("@mag@LOTTERY REWARDS", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@blu@CONGRATS! YOU HAVE WON A PARTYHAT SET FROM THE LOTTERY", 8146);
sendQuest("@blu@THE LOTTERY WAS MADE BY OWNER GOLEMX. CODED GREATLY!", 8147);
sendQuest("@blu@ENJOY THE PRIZES AND THE SERVER.", 8148);
sendQuest("@blu@SELL THE PRIZES TO SHOPS, PLAYERS, OR STAFF.", 8149);
sendQuest("@mag@IF YOU HAVE SUGGESTIONS FOR LOTTERY TELL THEM TO :", 8153);
sendQuest("@mag@OWNER GOLEMX BY DOING ::SUGGEST!", 8154);
sendQuest("@cya@------GOLEMXSCAPE LOTTERY------", 8158);
sendQuestSomething(8174);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " @mag@HAS WON A PARTYHAT SET FROM THE LOTTERY!");
deleteItem(1505, getItemSlot(1505), 1);


if(message == 1)
addItem(15000, 1);
